title: Edgar Winter's White Trash - Roadwork (1972) [FLAC]
description:
A legendary live album of the Seventies. Edgar announced the guest appearance of Johnny with the words: "People keep asking me - where's your brother?" Twenty years later Johnny used this quote as title for his studio album  'Hey, Where's Your Brother?' featuring Edgar on various tracks.
